duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify, qualify, advance, and close opportunities for Oracle’s Public Safety solution(s) within the Local Government Global Business Unit (LGGBU).

Grow business within a prescribed territory set by the Unit, lead and drive sales opportunities through strategic selling, negotiate and close business, and lead the ongoing business relationship with clients.
Build, advance, and maintain an active pipeline of forecasted sales to meet annual quota objectives.
Demonstrate Oracle’s Local Government value propositions to local government agency prospects and decision-makers.
Prepare RFP responses, pricing, and budgetary proposals. Supervise all activity related to your opportunities sales processes within Oracle’s Sales Cloud.
Stay up to date on Public Safety competitive landscape and technology.
Be a good human and team member.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
